properties.value: A high elf with shoulder length honey colored hair, pale skin, and green eyes. He is dressed in a light grey flowing cloak of fine material over a mail shirt. Supple leather boots show the wear of far travel but the durability of fine craftsmanship.

properties.name: char-sheet-notes
properties.value:
D&D5e Character Sheet by Corym. You can delete this text (or replace it with your own notes) once you are familiar with the layout. This layout is optimized for play not creation, start with a printed sheet!

Character: This tab, focused on things that describe the character and things you change/refer to only rarely

Combat: Optimized for quick reference in the heat of battle!

Stats/Saves/Skills: Go here if you need to make a saving throw, a skill check, or an ability check, or to apply a temporary modifier to an ability

Spells: Spells and special attacks, some of which may be copied onto the Combat tab for quick access

Internal: Nothing here to see, these are controls used internally by the character sheet, don't change anything on this tab!

properties.name: Class-Benefits
properties.value: Fighting style (Choose 1: Protection - reaction to impose  disadvantage on 1 attack against adjacent ally), Second Wind (1 per short rest, bonus action to recover 1d10 + level HP)

properties.name: Wealth
properties.value:
Copper: 0   Silver (10 CP): 10   Electrum (5 silver): 0   Gold (10 silver): 14 Platinum (10 Gold): 0

Gems: 

Jewelry (non-magical or unknown):

properties.name: Equipment
properties.value: chain mail, shield, light crossbow, 20 bolts, warhammer, bedroll, mess kit, tinder box, dice, 10 torches, 1 set clothes, 10 rations, 50' hemp rope, waterskin, 1 soldier insignia

Ideals: Efficiency. Can't stand the army, they take too long to decide anything.

Bonds: The healers who saved what's left of my face 
All animals

Flaws: Enraged at abuse . Tends to act hastily. Git 'em!

Backstory: Blacksmith for a mercenary group. Kicked by a mule, left behind at the healer's, sees no need to go back to them. Looking for a good dwarven smith who would train him. 

Recent activity: Working for Gnomish alchemist in South Malton

properties.name: AT02-Warhammer-2H
properties.message:
Warhammer (2 handed): Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)}
To Hit {attack-roll + proficiency+ strength } damage  {@:csi-crit-bonus-dice + 1:d10 + strength}  bludgeoning

AT04-rapier
properties.message:
Rapier: Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)}
To Hit {attack-roll + proficiency + @:max(strength, dexterity):} damage {@:csi-crit-bonus-dice + 1:d8 + @:max(strength, dexterity):} piercing

properties.message:
Warhammer (1 handed): Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)}
To Hit {attack-roll + proficiency + strength } damage  {@:csi-crit-bonus-dice + 1:d8 + strength}  bludgeoning

properties.name: SP01-General-spell
properties.message: Spell attack: Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)} To Hit {attack-roll + spell-attack-bonus } save DC {spell-save-dc}

properties.name: quick-instructions
properties.message: Many fields generate a roll or give instructions if you double click them, they may appear in the chat POSTING AS preview box first and then you have to hit send. You can also send a Saved Message with !m and the (case sensitive!) name of the message or enough of the name to uniquely identify it, try !m AT01

properties.name: death-saves-made
properties.message: Attempt a Death Save (need unmodified 10):  This roll {other-roll = 1d20;} Saves made:{death-saves-made = death-saves-made + ( other-roll < 10 ? 0 : 1 )}  Saves failed:{death-saves-failed = death-saves-failed + ( other-roll == 1 ? 2 : other-roll  < 10 ? 1 : 0 )}  {( other-roll == 20 ? " You revived!" : "" )} {( death-saves-made > 2 ? "You revived!" : " ")} {( death-saves-failed > 2 ? "You died!" : " ")}

properties.name: daily-acts
properties.value:
After long rest (1 per day, 8 hours min) regain all HP, regain Recovery Dice = 1/2 level

Wizards & Clerics: recover spell slots, change prepared spells

properties.name: take-long-rest-now
properties.message: !h Taking a long rest. Regain all HP {hit-points = @:hit-points-maximum:} Regain level/2 (round up) recovery dice {recovery-dice-used = (recovery-dice-used <= ceil(level/2) ? 0 : recovery-dice-used - ceil(level/2))}, regain spell slots (NOTE: Attribute assignment bug means do individually){spell-slots-used-one=0}{spell-slots-used-two=0}{spell-slots-used-three=0}, reset Arcane Recovery {arcane-recovery-used = 0}, reset Second Wind {second-wind-used = 0}, If fighter level 2+ then reset Action Surge {action-surge-used = 0}. If Cleric level 2+ reset Channel Divinity {channel-divinity-used= 0}.

properties.name: arcane-recovery-used
properties.message: Recover {(1 - arcane-recovery-used) * ceil(level / 2)} levels of spell slots. Check the box {arcane-recovery-used = 1}

properties.name: combat-notes
properties.value: Mostly attack wielding Warhammer and Shield. Attacks are 1 handed Warhammer, 2 handed Warhammer, and light crossbow. They are on the Actions tab (tab 4) or can be accessed by pasting in chat "!m AT01", "!m AT02", or "!m AT03" (case sensitive) respectively.

properties.name: attack-melee
properties.message: Warhammer (1 handed): Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)} To Hit {attack-roll + prof + str } damage  {@:csi-crit-bonus-dice + 1:d8 + str}  bludgeoning

properties.name: attack-ranged
properties.message: light crossbow (loading, 2 handed, range 80/320): Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)} To Hit {attack-roll + prof + dexterity }   damage  {@:csi-crit-bonus-dice + 1:d8 + dexterity} piercing

properties.name: at-will-acts
properties.value: Protection (Fighter style): every round (while shield equipped) as reaction impose disadvantage on 1 attack targeting ally within 5'

properties.name: short-rest-acts
properties.value: After any short rest can spend recovery dice to regain HP. Fighter regains Second Wind. Fighter level 2+ regains Action Surge (take 1 extra action once).

properties.name: take-short-rest-now
properties.message: !h If wizard and Arcane Recovery not used can use now. If fighter reset Second Wind {second-wind-used = 0} and if level > 2 Action Surge {action-surge-used = 0}. If Cleric level 2+ reset Channel Divinity {channel-divinity-used= 0}

properties.name: Second-Wind-used
properties.message: Restore {other-roll = (1-Second-Wind-used) * (1d10 + level)} HP for a total of {hit-points = min(hit-points + other-roll, hit-points-maximum)} out of {hit-points-maximum} hit points. Check the box {Second-Wind-used = 1}

properties.name: Recovery-dice-used
properties.message: Recovery die attempted for {other-roll = ( Recovery-dice-used >= HP-Recovery-dice ? 0 : max(1d@:hit-die-size: + constitution, 0))} HP for a total of {hit-points = ( Recovery-dice-used < HP-Recovery-dice ? min(hit-points + other-roll, hit-points-maximum) : hit-points )} out of {hit-points-maximum} hit points. Check the box {Recovery-dice-used = ( Recovery-dice-used < HP-Recovery-dice ? Recovery-dice-used + 1 : Recovery-dice-used ) }

properties.value: NOTE: "Base" stats are edited by using "Edit the page" and "Edit the control" and assigning values to the sub-components (Raw Roll, Racial Mod, Level up Mod, etc.)

properties.name: spell-attack-bonus
properties.message: Spell attack: Raw { attack-roll = 1d20@:csi-attack-suffix: } {csi-crit-message = ( attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? " (norm) " : " (crit?) ")} {csi-crit-bonus-dice = (attack-roll < crit-on-natural ? +0 : +1)} To Hit {attack-roll + spell-attack-bonus } save DC {spell-save-dc}

properties.name: use-thief-tools
properties.message: Use thieves tools (open lock, disarm trap, etc): {1d20 + use-thief-tools}
